pageContent: Objective: To explore the effect of neoadjuvant androgen suppression (AS) compared to no AS on cancer-related outcomes after radical high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) therapy for men with presumed organ-confined prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
HIFU Tissue Ablation: Concept and Devices
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/26486329/
